    • Method Detail

      • build

        public FlowJobBuilder build()
        Build a flow and inject it into the parent builder. The parent builder is then returned so it can be enhanced before building an actual job. Normally called explicitly via FlowBuilder.end().
        Overrides:
        build in class FlowBuilder<FlowJobBuilder>
        Returns:
        a flow
        See Also:
        FlowBuilder.build()
